author: MarÃ­a JosÃ© Quintero
title: Atentado con motobomba en Samaniego, NariÃ±o
text:
Una moto cargada con explosivos detonÃ³ en el parque Sol Andino de Samaniego, municipio de NariÃ±o. ExplotÃ³ a pocos metros de la EstaciÃ³n de PolicÃ­a. El atentado habrÃ­a dejado dos personas heridas, segÃºn reportan La FM y W Radio de Pasto.
Por el momento, se desconoce la versiÃ³n oficial del EjÃ©rcito y la PolicÃ­a de NariÃ±o.
ðŸ“Œ Una explosiÃ³n de motobomba se reportÃ³ este jueves 22 de agosto en Samaniego, NariÃ±o. MÃ¡s detalles en: https://t.co/INfIHmc2dC pic.twitter.com/P8WGgHNE5w
â€” El PaÃ­s Cali ðŸ“° (@elpaiscali) August 22, 2024 NariÃ±o, un departamento golpeado por la violencia. Es uno de los cuatro departamentos de la regiÃ³n PacÃ­fica, una de las mÃ¡s golpeadas por el conflicto armado y la violencia. En esa regiÃ³n operan grupos armados ilegales y varias bandas criminales locales. Especialmente, el Estado Mayor Central (EMC) al mando de â€œMordiscoâ€ y que ha atentado este aÃ±o numerosas veces en Valle, Cauca y NariÃ±o.
SegÃºn Indepaz , NariÃ±o tiene mÃ¡s de 445 mil vÃ­ctimas del conflicto armado: una representaciÃ³n del 27,3% de las vÃ­ctimas totales en el paÃ­s. Samaniego, particularmente, es uno de los municipios de NariÃ±o con mÃ¡s masacres, asesinatos a lÃ­deres y firmantes de paz.

author: @tellychakkar
title: Prathmesh Parabâ€™s brotherhood tales with Bhuvan Bam and Director Himank Gaur on the sets of Taaza Khabhar Season 2!
text: [Prathmesh Parabâ€™s brotherhood tales with Bhuvan Bam and Director Himank Gaur on the sets of Taaza Khabhar Season 2!](/digital/prathmesh-parab-s-brotherhood-tales-bhuvan-bam-and-director-himank-gaur-the-sets-of-taaza) [TellychakkarTeam](/users/tellychakkarteam)on Fri, 09/20/2024 - 01:03 MUMBAI: Vasya aur uske vardaan ke beech ayegi uski kismat ya koi dushman? A tale of miracles and magic that led Vasya to a journey of greed and arrogance but was it all a facade? The much-awaited Hotstar Specialsâ€™ Taaza Khabar is back with its season 2 streaming exclusively on 27th September 2024 on Disney+ Hotstar. Produced by Rohit Raj and Bhuvan Bam under the banner of BB Ki Vines Productions and Directed by Himank Gaur, the series also stars the veteran actor Jaaved Jaaferi along with Shriya Pilgaonkar, Prathamesh Parab, Deven Bhojani and Shilpa Shukla in prominent roles among others. Vasyaâ€™s destiny and his vardaan will be challenged by the powerful Yusuf Akhtar leading to risking his life yet again along with his loved ones. Will Vasya be able to fight it or will Vardaan support him this time again? While talking about his experiences and the bond created during the shoot for the latest season, Prathamesh Parab said how he found brotherhood on the sets of Taaza Khabar season 2. He received undying support and guidance throughout the season from his director Himank Gaur , and co-star Bhuvan Bam . He opened up saying â€œHimank Gaur is like a brother to me now. He supported and helped me a lot in Season 1 and Season 2. He guided me throughout both seasons. Without him, I donâ€™t think this show would have turned out the way it has. The best thing about him is that he always listens to our point of view.â€ Talking about Bhuvan Bam, Prathmesh said â€œIn the previous season, Peter and Vasya were good friends, but in this season, I think they share a bond that is like brothers. Bhuvan acted really well and taught me so many things on set. This also increased our bond, which you will clearly see on screen. I think not only onscreen but our offscreen bonding is also very good. We always have each other's backs. There were many difficult scenes as well that we shot together, where our whole bodies used to be covered with dust. When we were shooting in the dump yard, we used to forget our lines because of the bad smell of that yard.â€ Get ready to witness the ultimate quest for money and fame with a touch of comedy with Taaza Khabar Season 2 only on Disney+ Hotstar streaming from 27th September 2024

author: Deborah Tolu-Kolawole
title: Retirees plan protest over N32,000 pension increment
text: We call on the Federal Government to declare a state of emergency in the Contributory Pension Scheme and to take immediate steps to clear all governmentâ€™s liabilities in this sector before December 16, 2024.

author: Anonym
title: CAN 2024: Angola dominates Mauritania in a spectacular match and can dream of the eighth - Teller Report
text: Summary CAN 2024: Angola dominates Mauritania in a spectacular match and can dream of the eighth Angola returns to victory. In BouakÃ©, Saturday January 20, the Palancas Negras got the better of a thrilling encounter, notably thanks to Gelson Dala's spectacular double, over an eye-catching Mauritania (3-2, group D). The Angolans are well placed to reach the round of 16 before the last day of the group stage. Angolan forward #10 Gelson Dala (R) celebrates with his teammates after scoring his team's second goal during the 2024 Africa Cup of Nations (CAN) Group D football match between Mauritania and Angola at the Stade de la Paix in BouakÃ© on January 20, 2024. AFP - KENZO TRIBOUILLARD By: Nicolas Bamba Follow Advertisement Read more From our special correspondent in BouakÃ© From our special correspondent in BouakÃ© , Nicolas Bamba What a spectacle again in this decidedly very lively and offensive CAN 2024 ! After the draw snatched by Algeria against Burkina Faso in BouakÃ© (2-2), the Mauritanians and the Angolans put on a show in the same city. And the spectators got their money's worth with five goals scored, some of which were splendid. Untouchable Amar After a balanced first half hour and without big chances, the match got excited at the Peace Stadium with this duel missed by Mourabitoune Ibnou Ba against goalkeeper Adilson da Cruz Neblu. In the following action, Angola was much more lethal, with this perfect recovery by Gelson Dala (30th). In the stands where the Mauritanian supporters were more numerous than those of the Palancas Negras, a huge outpouring of joy broke out before the break, echoing the feat of Sidi Amar. The Mauritania winger performed a high-class slalom in the Angolan defense before shaking the net (43rd). And to think that a few moments later, Gilberto could have given his team the advantage if his shot against the empty cage had not gone over. Read alsoCAN 2024: The calendar, all the results and rankings The last word at the Palancas Negras Invigorated by this scenario, Amir Abdou's players were however quickly cooled by a complicated start to the second half. No doubt upset at being caught, the Angolans accelerated and scored twice in quick succession. Gelson Dala, starting from midfield, escaped the defense and dived his ball past the goalkeeper for the double (50th). Then, Gilberto, with a deflected shot, gave Angola some breathing space (53rd). More was still needed to extend Mauritania's enthusiasm and audacity. Aboubakary KoÃ¯ta recalled this brilliantly. 25 meters from the cage, the attacker created a new marvel: a hook to eliminate the defender, then a cannon shot into the top corner (58th). Certainly one of the most beautiful jewels of this first round. Read alsoRelive the match commented by our journalists Despite new opportunities on both sides, the fireworks did not return the powder and the meeting ended with this victory for the Palancas Negras (3-2). A small event for coach Pedro GonÃ§alves and his team; Angola had not won a group match at CAN 2012. Their men have 4 points and are at the top of group D, tied with Burkina Faso. Mauritania remains fourth with 0 points behind Algeria (2 points) and will have to accomplish a feat to hope to be among the best thirds. Newsletter Newsletter Receive all the international news directly in your inbox I subscribe Follow all the international news by downloading the RFI application Share : Continue reading on the same themes: CAN 2024 Angola Mauritania Soccer
